function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on technology for disease prevention and control","Impact":"Overreliance can lead to vulnerabilities and failure to address human behavioral factors in disease propagation","Mitigation":"Balance technology with human-centric measures and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"IoT, big data, robotics, drones","People":"Urban residents, city authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Urban planners, public health officials, city governments"},{"Description":"Lack of collaboration and integration in smart city environments","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics and other urban crises due to lack of coordination and cooperation","Mitigation":"Promote collaborative governance models, integrate different smart city systems, and establish communication channels","Technologies":"Digital collaboration tools, integrated smart city platforms","People":"City authorities, policymakers, technology companies","Owner":"Urban planners, city governments, technology companies"},{"Description":"Unpreparedness of smart cities for pandemics","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics and failure to harness the full potential of smart technologies","Mitigation":"Develop and implement comprehensive pandemic preparedness plans, invest in public health infrastructure and emergency response systems","Technologies":"Smart health monitoring systems, data analytics for disease tracking, emergency response technologies","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, city authorities","Owner":"City governments, public health agencies"}]}
